      no

      is that the african or european swallow

7.3.21  10:42 am   Are you interested in philosophy of religion?

      how about religion of philosophy

7.3.21  6:50 am   how to make people mad?

      treat them like a stranger

7.3.21  5:54 am   how do i break the rules if im too lazy to learn what they are

      by accident

7.3.21  1:06 am   will any of your songs ever have coherent lyrics?

      will any of your questions ever be coherent

7.3.21  1:04 am   what's the deal

      dealer's choice

7.2.21  11:29 pm   how to be stupid?

      treat someone like a stranger

7.2.21  11:16 pm   Why aren't you posting videos frequently?

      because i'm not capable of making them fast enough to be considered 'frequent'. i also refuse to post videos which i didn't make

7.2.21  10:19 pm   In the song "money" what is the significance to the narrative of the lyric "away" resolving to a major I instead of minor? I was wondering if it was just stylistic or something else.

      we're about to 'launch' into the B section. so it felt right. your explanation works too, and i'm not surprised, because the music and the lyrics are designed together, so they're surely working toward the same effect

7.2.21  7:57 pm   How would you suggest learning guitar, other than picking it up and playing it

      the only other option i can think of is to lay it on the table face up and try playing it that way

7.2.21  7:38 pm   What's in the box

      a bag

7.2.21  7:29 pm   Are you going to or have you made a song in 432Hz?

      no

7.2.21  7:10 pm   Is the word journey in the next song?

      no

7.2.21  7:04 pm   Are you made of music?

      no, BUT, me and music are made of the same thing

7.2.21  6:09 pm   how do i sleep

      get so tired your brain starts making up its own reality. try to do it lying down in a safe place

7.2.21  2:47 pm   do you like grass

      maybe if it didn't grow so fast

7.2.21  2:31 pm   is there a difference between the bad thing and the strange thing

      opinion

7.2.21  9:48 am   how do i learn chords

      1 note at a time

7.2.21  9:29 am   why do so many people write love songs?

      because there is so much love

7.2.21  8:13 am   how do i get cancelled on tweeter

      root for the other team

7.2.21  6:58 am   why do you rarely end songs with a fade out

      because i can usually think of something i like better

7.2.21  5:08 am   Can you solve this hardest scramble word?

MTOIGRNIA

      migration

7.2.21  1:02 am   what happened to your song that was supposed to come out in 2020?

      it took until 2021 to finish the video

7.2.21  12:41 am   Just curious.
Why don't you use any uppercase letters or periods in your answers?

      because so far you have never read any of the ones with multiple sentences, acronyms, chord symbols, or emphasis

7.1.21  11:49 pm   do you have time?

      almost

7.1.21  10:36 pm   what do i do when i can't find any songs of joy to sing? 

      you'll have to make up a new one

7.1.21  10:12 pm   what is your opinion about slightly rusty ball-bearings,

     not as rusty as they could be

      and why?

     context clues, based on your use of the word 'slightly'

7.1.21  7:47 pm   What is the fibonacci sequence?

      1, 1, etc

7.1.21  6:53 pm   Do your songs have deep meaning

      that's easy to find out: just try them and see how deep it makes you feel

7.1.21  6:12 pm   why do i exist

      to show others how it can be done

7.1.21  5:46 pm   what do you think about when coming up with a tweet? i want to make tweets like yours 

      i always think about the founders of twitter. i think to myself, "what would they tweet"

7.1.21  4:43 pm   are apples onions or no

      you'll have to peel it, and see if it reminds you of peeling an orange (for comparison)

7.1.21  2:52 pm   bill I hate my lyrical style how do I change it?

      i was going to say use different words, but then i thought about it more and i will say this instead: just use the words at much different TIMES. then they'll probably automatically become different words, and there will be different amounts of them, packed with different densities throughout different times. i have some other suggestions too

7.1.21  1:37 pm   What's your favorite movie?

      still haven't found one. i'm thinking i may have to do it myself

7.1.21  1:24 pm   how to fix something broken?

      explain to a stranger exactly how it works

7.1.21  11:44 am   Is the word my in the next song?

      no

7.1.21  7:11 am   do you think things are weird

      sure but that's normal

7.1.21  4:21 am   Is the reference to long long journey in here comes the sun intentional

      no, and also backwards, in time. because the other one was written earlier, by several years.

7.1.21  3:27 am   can you write a book

      i can write. i can't bind a book, but, what i can do is write a document much larger than book binding can even hold

7.1.21  2:48 am   do you feel like there's a context from to your songs (when they were written, how you were feeling when you wrote them, other ideas from around that time, etc.) that is lost on everyone but you?

     no

     if so, how important do you think this context is?

     it depends on the context that context is being used in

      do you think there are any solutions?

     yes. the solution of course is to contextualize the context

7.1.21  12:46 am   What do You feel about people asking overly stupid questions on this page?

      it's impossible for me to know which ones are stupid. that's what excites me





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

6.30.21  6:25 pm   How to deal with feelings of romance and stuff?

      you could try putting it into a surrealist story

6.30.21  6:06 pm   Any tips for making a surrealist story

      just walk out of your front door

6.30.21  5:44 pm   Why is the sky blue?

      it's what you requested

6.30.21  4:06 pm   i have too many ideas, and i try to bring them to life, but more keep popping, i feel like a juggler and more balls keep coming. how do i not panic ? i want to do everything

      i know, but i have good news and bad news. the bad news is there's actually even more than you think, and you definitely can't juggle them all because there's literally infinite. but the good news is if you switch to a swimming analogy it works

6.30.21  3:02 pm   What to do when your arms hurt?

      sing songs of joy

6.30.21  2:22 pm   Is it true that the more things change, the more they stay the same? Why or why not in your eyes?

      it's just a realization that things change and things also stay the same. it's like, just when you start to think that everything changes, you'll probably notice something else that stays the same. or just when you notice something staying the same, you'll notice that something else changes. this is because changes and sameness are 2 very common qualities of this universe. this becomes more apparent as time passes

6.30.21  1:02 pm   why does this website exist

      so you can go to it

6.30.21  12:53 pm   what is your opinion on death

      too weird. can't handle
